name: Milo Against Time!
description:
Minigame Survival Game made for Ludum Dare 50, with the theme "Delay the Inevitable" along with a group of Image Campus Students on their first year of art and animation for videogames (imagecampus.edu.ar).

A Game By:

Luigi De Angelis - Game Designer and Programming. 🎮🤖

Tomas Verhagen - UI and 2D Artist. 🖼️🎨

Suni Bottinelli - 2D Artist and Animator. 🎨🎞️

Zoe Cazas - 2D Artist and Animator . 🎨🎞️

Elliott Barsellini Desirello - Adviser 💡
